source.name: Fill in the Blank
source.text: If you want to make something happen multiple times you use a <<<loop>>>. To make something happen without an end you use the <<<forever>>> block. If you want something to happen a specific number of times you use the <<<repeat>>> block. If you want something to happen until a specific condition is met you use a <<<repeat until>>> block.
